a. Section 3(b) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
“Heritage shall purchase all ingredients and packaging materials identified in Schedule C to be used in connection with the

Heritage shall invoice Premier within 15 days of delivery of the Products."
perturbation.explanation: By adding 'Heritage shall invoice Premier within 15 days of delivery of the Products,' we are introducing a potential contradiction. perturbation.changed_text:
Section 3 DELIVER, PRICING, BILLING AND PAYMENT
Premier agrees to pay all invoices within 30 days of receipt. Late payments will incur a penalty of 10% per month. 
However, invoices related to Schedule A-1 Products, payment will be within 60 days of receipt, and late payments will only incur a penalty of 2% per month
